name: The Travelers
description:
A ferry operator guides passengers on their transition from origin to destination.

Controls:

  • Navigate the world using mouse and keyboard (WASD).
  • Interact with objects by clicking E.
  • Pause the game with the Tab key.
  • End the game with the Escape key.

Created by Nathan Wiles, Travis McCoy, and Kaitrin McCoy.

Attribution:
Bench Model, Sconce Model
